The patient’s clinical status also improved, with regained ability to ambulate short distances and a reduction in dysphagia. However, laboratory monitoring revealed grade 3 thrombocytopenia (platelet count 45 × 10⁹/L) attributed to ONC201, while white‑blood‑cell and hemoglobin levels remained within normal limits.
